channel.title: Projectile problem
channel.description:
So i got this problem with projectiles, lets say i cast fire wave on a person who was walking, when i cast it and click on him he somehow teleports/glitches(instead of walking like normal and getting hit) to where he was headed then the projectile hits him.
any help or points in the right directions would be much appreciated :D
Fixed :D
